parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to get the text displayed in the hidden cell, false to not

title: ITableAnnotation.DisplayedText2
description: Gets the actual text displayed in the specified cell in this table.
signature:
System.String DisplayedText2( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Column
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
) {get;}

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to get the text displayed in the hidden cell, false to not

returns: Actual text displayed in the specified cell
remarks:
Index for both rows and columns is 0-based.
To get the parameterized string that drives this displayed text, use
ITableAnnotation::Text2
.
